name: Current Date & Time
description: Returns the current date and time in the selected timezone. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from datetime import datetime
from zoneinfo import ZoneInfo
from typing import List

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message

class CurrentDateComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Current Date 🕰️"
    description = "Returns the current date and time in the selected timezone."
    icon = "🕰️"

    inputs = [
        DropdownInput(
            name="timezone",
            display_name="Timezone",
            options=[
                "UTC",
                "US/Eastern",
                "US/Central",
                "US/Mountain",
                "US/Pacific",
                "Europe/London",
                "Europe/Paris",
                "Asia/Tokyo",
                "Australia/Sydney",
                "America/Sao_Paulo",
                "America/Cuiaba",
            ],
            value="UTC",
            info="Select the timezone for the current date and time.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Current Date", name="current_date", method="get_current_date"),
        Output(display_name="Current Time", name="current_time", method="get_current_time"),
    ]

    def get_current_date(self) -> Message:
        try:
            tz = ZoneInfo(self.timezone)
            # current_date = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")
            current_date = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%d/%m/%Y")
            result = f"{current_date}"
            self.status = result
            return Message(text=result)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Error: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)

    def get_current_time(self) -> Message:
        try:
            tz = ZoneInfo(self.timezone)
            # current_time = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")
            current_time = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%H:%M:%S")
            result = f"{current_time}"
            self.status = result
            return Message(text=result)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Error: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)

from datetime import datetime
from zoneinfo import ZoneInfo
from typing import List

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message

class CurrentDateComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Current Date 🕰️"
    description = "Returns the current date and time in the selected timezone."
    icon = "🕰️"

    inputs = [
        DropdownInput(
            name="timezone",
            display_name="Timezone",
            options=[
                "UTC",
                "US/Eastern",
                "US/Central",
                "US/Mountain",
                "US/Pacific",
                "Europe/London",
                "Europe/Paris",
                "Asia/Tokyo",
                "Australia/Sydney",
                "America/Sao_Paulo",
                "America/Cuiaba",
            ],
            value="UTC",
            info="Select the timezone for the current date and time.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Current Date", name="current_date", method="get_current_date"),
        Output(display_name="Current Time", name="current_time", method="get_current_time"),
    ]

    def get_current_date(self) -> Message:
        try:
            tz = ZoneInfo(self.timezone)
            # current_date = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")
            current_date = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%d/%m/%Y")
            result = f"{current_date}"
            self.status = result
            return Message(text=result)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Error: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)

    def get_current_time(self) -> Message:
        try:
            tz = ZoneInfo(self.timezone)
            # current_time = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")
            current_time = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%H:%M:%S")
            result = f"{current_time}"
            self.status = result
            return Message(text=result)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Error: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)
